link.title: Yorktown Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Please read the attached letters for the most recent COVID-19 Update for Yorktown ISD.
To better serve out community, we are posting on our Twitter and Facebook pages as well.
If you have any questions, please send them to our new contact email: questions@yisd.org

div.script: stLight.options({ publisher: "ddb4fa0a-d941-46b8-b9b6-a5d72fd54589", doNotHash: false, doNotCopy: false, hashAddressBar: true });
